title: Best-ever chicken noodle soup
ingredients: ['100g wide noodles, such as tagliatelle or other pasta', '1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '3 litres chicken stock', '1 1/2 tablespoons salt', '1 teaspoon chicken seasoning', '120g celery, chopped', '160g onion, chopped', '45g cornflour', '4 tablespoons water', '425g cooked chicken meat, diced']
